notes.title: Penpot Integration Plan - Issue 1
notes.content:
**Understanding Penpot Architecture**
1. Explore the technical documentation of Penpot to grasp its architecture.
2. Identify the components and services that Penpot offers.
3. Assess the dependencies and requirements for running Penpot on self-hosted environments.
4. Consider how data handling and user permissions are managed in Penpot.
